        var cardName = jQuery('p.card_img > img').attr('alt'); 
        var sendTitle =  'カード詳細 ‐ ' + cardName + ' ｜WIXOSS-ウィクロス-｜タカラトミー';
        if(jQuery('#page > div.mean-bar > a > span').length){
                spSendPageVIew();
            }else{
                pcSendPageVIew();
            };
            function spSendPageVIew(){
                ga('send', 'pageview',{'title':sendTitle});
            }
            function pcSendPageVIew(){
                var cardNo = jQuery('#main > div > div.card_detail_title > p').text();
                ga('send','pageview',{
                    'page':"/products/wixoss/card/card_list.php?card=card_detail&card_no=" + cardNo ,
                    'title':sendTitle
                });    
        }
	</script>

			<dl class="selectBox"><dt class="txt_size2">日付</dt><dd><select name="date_list" id="date_list" class="select_none" onchange="Change()"><option value="date_all" id="date_all">開催日を選択</option><option value="2023/10/23（月）" id="option_2023/10/23（月）" class="option_date option_display_none option_view">2023/10/23（月）</option><option value="2023/10/24（火）" id="option_2023/10/24（火）" class="option_date option_display_none option_view">2023/10/24（火）</option><option value="2023/10/25（水）" id="option_2023/10/25（水）" class="option_date option_display_none option_view">2023/10/25（水）</option><option value="2023/10/26（木）" id="option_2023/10/26（木）" class="option_date option_display_none option_view">2023/10/26（木）</option><option value="2023/10/27（金）" id="option_2023/10/27（金）" class="option_date option_display_none option_view">2023/10/27（金）</option><option value="2023/10/28（土）" id="option_2023/10/28（土）" class="option_date option_display_none option_view">2023/10/28（土）</option><option value="2023/10/29（日）" id="option_2023/10/29（日）" class="option_date option_display_none option_view">2023/10/29（日）</option><option value="2023/10/30（月）" id="option_2023/10/30（月）" class="option_date option_display_none option_view">2023/10/30（月）</option><option value="2023/10/31（火）" id="option_2023/10/31（火）" class="option_date option_display_none option_view">2023/10/31（火）</option></select></dd></dl>
			
			<input type="button" value="詳細検索をリセット" onclick="buttonClick()">
			
			<script>
				window.onload = function(){
					//viewがついた要素がもつ日付と都道府県のclassを取得
					var view = document.getElementsByClassName("event_box view");
					let arr = [];
					let arr_state = [];
					let state = ["hokkaido","aomori","miyagi","iwate","akita","yamagata","fukushima","tokyo","kanagawa","saitama","chiba","ibaragi","tochigi","gunma","yamanashi","nagano","nigata","toyama","ishikawa","fukui","gifu","shizuoka","aichi","mie","shiga","kyoto","osaka","hyogo","nara","wakayama","tottori","shimane","okayama","hiroshima","yamaguchi","tokushima","kagawa","ehime","kochi","fukuoka","saga","nagasaki","kumamoto","oita","miyazaki","kagoshima","okinawa"];
					
					var length = view.length;
					var temporary = null;
					var h = 0;
					let state_number = [];
					for (var i = 0; i < length; i++){
						var target = document.getElementsByClassName("view")[i];
						var css_state = target.classList.item(4); //5番目のclassを取得
						var target_css =  "h4_" + css_state; //h4_日付 の形に
						if(css_state == null){
							length++;
						}
						if(target_css !== "h4_null"){
							arr.push(target_css);
							arr_state.push(css_state);
							h++;
							if(temporary == null){
								h = 0;
							}
							if(css_state !== temporary){
								if(temporary != null){
									state_number[temporary] = h;
									h = 0;
								}
							}
							temporary = css_state;
						}
					}
					h++;
					state_number[temporary] = h;

					for (const [key, value] of Object.entries(state_number)) {
						let text = document.getElementById("li_" + key);
						let text2 = "(" + value + ")";
						text.textContent = text2; 
					}
					
					for (const elem of arr) {
						document.getElementById(elem).classList.add("view");//日付_都道府県のIDをもつ要素にviewを追加
					}
					
					const newArr = arr_state.filter((element, index) => arr_state.indexOf(element) === index);
					let array_state_filter = [];
					array_state_filter = state.filter(i => arr_state.indexOf(i) == -1)
					for (const elem_state of state){
						document.getElementById(elem_state).classList.remove("none_active");
						document.getElementById("detail_cont_inner_" + elem_state).classList.remove("display_none");
					}
					for (const elem of array_state_filter) {
						document.getElementById(elem).classList.add("none_active");//日付_都道府県のIDをもつ要素にviewを追加
						document.getElementById("detail_cont_inner_" + elem).classList.add("display_none");
					}
					
					
					
					//viewがついた要素がもつ日付と都道府県のclassを取得
					var view_onload = document.getElementsByClassName("event_box view");
					let arr_onload = [];
					var length = view_onload.length;
					for (var i = 0; i < length; i++){
						var target = document.getElementsByClassName("view")[i];
						var css_day = target.classList.item(3); //4番目のclassを取得
						var css_state = target.classList.item(4); //5番目のclassを取得
						var target_css2 = css_day + "_" + css_state; //h4_日付 の形に
						if(css_day == null){
							length++;
						}
						if(target_css2 !== "null_null"){
							arr_onload.push(target_css2);

						}
					}
					for (const elem_onload of arr_onload) {
						document.getElementById(elem_onload).classList.add("view");//日付_都道府県のIDをもつ要素にviewを追加
					}
					
					var length_view = document.getElementsByClassName("event_box view");
					if(length_view.length != 0){
						document.getElementById("event_length").classList.add("event_none_view");
						document.getElementById("event_shop_list").classList.remove("display_none");
						let event_length = document.getElementById("event_length");
						event_length.textContent = '該当するイベントは' + length_view.length + '件あります';
					}else{
						document.getElementById("event_length").classList.remove("event_none_view");
						document.getElementById("event_shop_list").classList.add("display_none");
						let event_length = document.getElementById("event_length");
						event_length.textContent = '該当するイベントはありません';
					}
					
				}
				
				function Change(){
						
					//イベント検索のセレクトボックスIDを取得
					var event_list = document.getElementById('event_list');
						
					//選ばれているvalueを取得
					var view_event = event_list.value;
						
					//店舗検索のセレクトボックスIDを取得
					var shop_list = document.getElementById('shop_list');
						
					//選ばれているvalueを取得
					var view_shop = shop_list.value;
						
					//日付検索のセレクトボックスIDを取得
					var date_list = document.getElementById('date_list');
						
					//選ばれているvalueを取得
					var view_date = date_list.value;
						
					//日付検索のセレクトボックスIDを取得
					var state_list = document.getElementById('state_list');
						
					//選ばれているvalueを取得
					var view_state = state_list.value;
						
					//全てのイベントからviewを削除
					var event_box = document.getElementsByClassName("event_box");
					for (var i = 0; i < event_box.length; i++){
						document.getElementsByClassName("event_box")[i].classList.remove("view");
					}
						
					//全てのh4からviewを削除
					var h4wrapper1 = document.getElementsByClassName("h4wrapper1");
					for (var i = 0; i < h4wrapper1.length; i++){
						document.getElementsByClassName("h4wrapper1")[i].classList.remove("view");
					}
						
					//全てのh5からviewを削除
					var h5_date = document.getElementsByClassName("h5_date");
					for (var i = 0; i < h5_date.length; i++){
						document.getElementsByClassName("h5_date")[i].classList.remove("view");
					}
					
					
					//イベント選択の有無
					let child_event = document.createElement('option');
					child_event.id = "all"; 
					child_event.value = "all"; 
					let childnode_event = document.getElementById('all');
					if(view_event === "all"){
						child_event.append('イベントを選択');
						childnode_event.replaceWith(child_event);
						event_list.options[0].selected = true;
						document.getElementById("event_list").classList.add("select_none");
					}else{
						child_event.append('全てのイベント');
						childnode_event.replaceWith(child_event);
						document.getElementById("event_list").classList.remove("select_none");
					}
					
					//ショップ選択の有無
					let child_shop = document.createElement('option');
					child_shop.id = "shop_all"; 
					child_shop.value = "shop_all"; 
					let childnode_shop = document.getElementById('shop_all');
					if(view_shop === "shop_all"){
						child_shop.append('店舗を選択');
						childnode_shop.replaceWith(child_shop);
						shop_list.options[0].selected = true;
						document.getElementById("shop_list").classList.add("select_none");
					}else{
						child_shop.append('全ての店舗');
						childnode_shop.replaceWith(child_shop);
						document.getElementById("shop_list").classList.remove("select_none");
					}
					
					
					//日付選択の有無
					let child_date = document.createElement('option');
					child_date.id = "date_all"; 
					child_date.value = "date_all"; 
					let childnode_date = document.getElementById('date_all');
					if(view_date === "date_all"){
						child_date.append('開催日を選択');
						childnode_date.replaceWith(child_date);
						date_list.options[0].selected = true;
						document.getElementById("date_list").classList.add("select_none");
					}else{
						child_date.append('全ての開催日');
						childnode_date.replaceWith(child_date);
						document.getElementById("date_list").classList.remove("select_none");
					}
					
					//都道府県選択の有無
					let child_state = document.createElement('option');
					child_state.id = "state_all"; 
					child_state.value = "state_all"; 
					let childnode_state = document.getElementById('state_all');
					if(view_state === "state_all"){
						child_state.append('都道府県を選択');
						childnode_state.replaceWith(child_state);
						state_list.options[0].selected = true;
						document.getElementById("state_list").classList.add("select_none");
					}else{
						child_state.append('全ての都道府県');
						childnode_state.replaceWith(child_state);
						document.getElementById("state_list").classList.remove("select_none");
					}
					
					
					if(view_shop === "shop_all"){
						if(view_state === "state_all"){
							document.getElementById("event_shop_list").classList.remove("display_none");
						}else{
							document.getElementById("event_shop_list").classList.add("display_none");
						}	
					}else{
						if(view_state === "state_all"){
							document.getElementById("event_shop_list").classList.add("display_none");
						}else{
							document.getElementById("event_shop_list").classList.add("display_none");
						}	
					}
					
					if(view_event === "all"){ 
						if(view_shop === "shop_all"){ 
							if(view_date === "date_all"){
								if(view_state === "state_all"){
									
									// イベント×　店舗×　日付× 都道府県×
										
								}else{
										
									// イベント×　店舗×　日付× 都道府県○
									var class_binding = view_state;

								}
							}else{	
								if(view_state === "state_all"){
										
									// イベント×　店舗×　日付○ 都道府県×
									var class_binding = view_date;
										
								}else{
										
										// イベント×　店舗×　日付○ 都道府県○
										var class_binding = view_date + " " + view_state;

								}									
							}
						}else{		
							if(view_date === "date_all"){ 
								if(view_state === "state_all"){
									
									// イベント×　店舗○　日付× 都道府県×
									var class_binding = view_shop;
									
								}else{
										
									// イベント×　店舗○　日付× 都道府県○
									var class_binding = view_shop + " " + view_state;

								}									
							}else{
								if(view_state === "state_all"){
										
									// イベント×　店舗○　日付○ 都道府県×
									var class_binding = view_shop + " " + view_date;
										
								}else{
										
									// イベント×　店舗○　日付○ 都道府県○
									var class_binding = view_shop + " " + view_date + " " + view_state;

								}									
							}									
						}
					}else{
						if(view_shop === "shop_all"){
							if(view_date === "date_all"){
								if(view_state === "state_all"){
										
									// イベント○　店舗×　日付× 都道府県×
									var class_binding = view_event;
										
								}else{
										
									// イベント○　店舗×　日付× 都道府県○
									var class_binding = view_event + " " + view_state;

								}									
							}else{
								if(view_state === "state_all"){
										
									// イベント○　店舗×　日付○ 都道府県×
									var class_binding = view_event + " " + view_date;
										
								}else{
										
									// イベント○　店舗×　日付○ 都道府県○
									var class_binding = view_event + " " + view_date + " " + view_state;

								}									
							}
						}else{
							if(view_date === "date_all"){
								if(view_state === "state_all"){
										
									// イベント○　店舗○　日付× 都道府県×
									var class_binding = view_event + " " + view_shop;
										
								}else{
										
									// イベント○　店舗○　日付× 都道府県○
									var class_binding = view_event + " " + view_shop + " " + view_state;

								}									
							}else{
								if(view_state === "state_all"){
										
									// イベント○　店舗○　日付○ 都道府県×
									var class_binding = view_event + " " + view_shop + " " + view_date;
										
								}else{
										
									// イベント○　店舗○　日付○ 都道府県○
									var class_binding = view_event + " " + view_shop + " " + view_date + " " + view_state;

								}									
							}
						}
					}
					
					var array_view = document.getElementsByClassName(class_binding);
					for (var i = 0; i < array_view.length; i++){
						document.getElementsByClassName(class_binding)[i].classList.add("view");
					}
					
					if(view_event === "all"){ 
						if(view_shop === "shop_all"){ 
							if(view_date === "date_all"){ 
								if(view_state === "state_all"){ 
									//全てのイベントにviewを追加
									var event_box = document.getElementsByClassName("event_box");
									for (var i = 0; i < event_box.length; i++){
										document.getElementsByClassName("event_box")[i].classList.add("view");
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
						
					//viewがついた要素がもつ日付と都道府県のclassを取得
					var view = document.getElementsByClassName("event_box view");
					let arr = [];
					let arr_state = [];
					let state = ["hokkaido","aomori","miyagi","iwate","akita","yamagata","fukushima","tokyo","kanagawa","saitama","chiba","ibaragi","tochigi","gunma","yamanashi","nagano","nigata","toyama","ishikawa","fukui","gifu","shizuoka","aichi","mie","shiga","kyoto","osaka","hyogo","nara","wakayama","tottori","shimane","okayama","hiroshima","yamaguchi","tokushima","kagawa","ehime","kochi","fukuoka","saga","nagasaki","kumamoto","oita","miyazaki","kagoshima","okinawa"];
					
					var length = view.length;
					var temporary = null;
					var h = 0;
					let state_number = [];
					for (var i = 0; i < length; i++){
						var target = document.getElementsByClassName("view")[i];
						var css_state = target.classList.item(4); //5番目のclassを取得
						var target_css =  "h4_" + css_state; //h5_日付 の形に
						if(css_state == null){
							length++;
						}
						if(target_css !== "h4_null"){
							arr.push(target_css);
							arr_state.push(css_state);
							h++;
							if(temporary == null){
								h = 0;
							}
							if(css_state !== temporary){
								if(temporary != null){
									state_number[temporary] = h;
									h = 0;
								}
							}
							temporary = css_state;
						}
					}
					h++;
					state_number[temporary] = h;
					
					for (const elem_state of state) {
						var x = document.getElementById("li_" + elem_state);
						x.innerHTML = "";
					}
					
					for (const [key, value] of Object.entries(state_number)) {
						let text = document.getElementById("li_" + key);
						let text2 = "(" + value + ")";
						text.textContent = text2; 
					}

					for (const elem of arr) {
						document.getElementById(elem).classList.add("view");//日付_都道府県のIDをもつ要素にviewを追加
					}
					
					const newArr = arr_state.filter((element, index) => arr_state.indexOf(element) === index);
					let array_state_filter = [];
					array_state_filter = state.filter(i => arr_state.indexOf(i) == -1)
					for (const elem_state of state){
						document.getElementById(elem_state).classList.remove("none_active");
					}
					for (const elem of array_state_filter) {
						document.getElementById(elem).classList.add("none_active");//日付_都道府県のIDをもつ要素にviewを追加
					}
					
					//viewがついた要素がもつ日付と都道府県のclassを取得
					var view2 = document.getElementsByClassName("event_box view");
					let arr2 = [];
					var length = view2.length;
					for (var i = 0; i < length; i++){
						var target = document.getElementsByClassName("view")[i];
						var css_day = target.classList.item(3); //4番目のclassを取得
						var css_state = target.classList.item(4); //5番目のclassを取得
						var target_css2 =  css_day + "_" + css_state; //h4_日付 の形に
						if(css_day == null){
							length++;
						}
						if(target_css2 !== "null_null"){
							arr2.push(target_css2);
							
						}
					}
					for (const elem2 of arr2) {
						document.getElementById(elem2).classList.add("view");//日付_都道府県のIDをもつ要素にviewを追加
					}
					
					//オプション
					
					let css_shop_list = [];
					let css_date_list = [];
					let css_state_list = [];
					let css_target_view = "";
					let css_target_view2 = "";
					var shop_view = document.getElementsByClassName("option_display_none");
					for (var i = 0; i < shop_view.length; i++){
						document.getElementsByClassName("option_display_none")[i].classList.remove("option_view");
					}
					
					
					if(view_state === "state_all"){ 
						if(view_shop === "shop_all"){ 
							if(view_date === "date_all"){ 
								var option_state = document.getElementsByClassName("option_state");
								for (var i = 0; i < option_state.length; i++){
									document.getElementsByClassName("option_state")[i].classList.add("option_view");
								}
								var option_shop = document.getElementsByClassName("option_shop");
								for (var i = 0; i < option_shop.length; i++){
									document.getElementsByClassName("option_shop")[i].classList.add("option_view");
								}
								var option_date = document.getElementsByClassName("option_date");
								for (var i = 0; i < option_date.length; i++){
									document.getElementsByClassName("option_date")[i].classList.add("option_view");
								}

							}else{
								css_target_view = "event_box " + view_date;
								
								var target_view = document.getElementsByClassName(css_target_view);
								for (var i = 0; i < target_view.length; i++){
									var target = document.getElementsByClassName(css_target_view)[i];
									var targetcss_shop = target.classList.item(2); //3番目のclassを取得
									var targetcss_state = target.classList.item(4); //4番目のclassを取得
									css_shop_list.push(targetcss_shop);
									css_state_list.push(targetcss_state);
								}	
								
								for (const elem of css_state_list) {
									document.getElementById("option_" + elem).classList.add("option_view");//日付_都道府県のIDをもつ要素にviewを追加
								}
								for (const elem of css_shop_list) {
									document.getElementById("option_" + elem).classList.add("option_view");//日付_都道府県のIDをもつ要素にviewを追加
								}
								var option_date = document.getElementsByClassName("option_date");
								for (var i = 0; i < option_date.length; i++){
									document.getElementsByClassName("option_date")[i].classList.add("option_view");
								}
								
							}
						}else{
								css_target_view = "event_box " + view_shop;
							
								var target_view = document.getElementsByClassName(css_target_view);
								for (var i = 0; i < target_view.length; i++){
									var target = document.getElementsByClassName(css_target_view)[i];
									var targetcss_date = target.classList.item(3); //3番目のclassを取得
									css_date_list.push(targetcss_date);
								}	
								var option_state = document.getElementsByClassName("option_state");
								for (var i = 0; i < option_state.length; i++){
									document.getElementsByClassName("option_state")[i].classList.add("option_view");
								}
								var option_shop = document.getElementsByClassName("option_shop");
								for (var i = 0; i < option_shop.length; i++){
									document.getElementsByClassName("option_shop")[i].classList.add("option_view");
								}
								for (const elem of css_date_list) {
									document.getElementById("option_" + elem).classList.add("option_view");//日付_都道府県のIDをもつ要素にviewを追加
								}
						}
					}else{
						if(view_shop === "shop_all"){ 
								css_target_view = "event_box " + view_state;
							
								var target_view = document.getElementsByClassName(css_target_view);
								for (var i = 0; i < target_view.length; i++){
									var target = document.getElementsByClassName(css_target_view)[i];
									var targetcss_shop = target.classList.item(2); //3番目のclassを取得
									var targetcss_date = target.classList.item(3); //4番目のclassを取得
									css_shop_list.push(targetcss_shop);
									css_date_list.push(targetcss_date);
								}	
								var option_state = document.getElementsByClassName("option_state");
								for (var i = 0; i < option_state.length; i++){
									document.getElementsByClassName("option_state")[i].classList.add("option_view");
								}
								for (const elem of css_shop_list) {
									document.getElementById("option_" + elem).classList.add("option_view");//日付_都道府県のIDをもつ要素にviewを追加
								}
								for (const elem of css_date_list) {
									document.getElementById("option_" + elem).classList.add("option_view");//日付_都道府県のIDをもつ要素にviewを追加
								}
						}else{
								css_target_view = "event_box " + view_state;
								css_target_view2 = "event_box " + view_shop;
							
								var target_view = document.getElementsByClassName(css_target_view);
								for (var i = 0; i < target_view.length; i++){
									var target = document.getElementsByClassName(css_target_view)[i];
									var targetcss_shop = target.classList.item(2); //3番目のclassを取得
									css_shop_list.push(targetcss_shop);
								}	
							
								var target_view2 = document.getElementsByClassName(css_target_view2);
								for (var i = 0; i < target_view2.length; i++){
									var target = document.getElementsByClassName(css_target_view2)[i];
									var targetcss_date = target.classList.item(3); //3番目のclassを取得
									css_date_list.push(targetcss_date);
								}	
							
								var option_state = document.getElementsByClassName("option_state");
								for (var i = 0; i < option_state.length; i++){
									document.getElementsByClassName("option_state")[i].classList.add("option_view");
								}
								for (const elem of css_shop_list) {
									document.getElementById("option_" + elem).classList.add("option_view");//日付_都道府県のIDをもつ要素にviewを追加
								}
								for (const elem of css_date_list) {
									document.getElementById("option_" + elem).classList.add("option_view");//日付_都道府県のIDをもつ要素にviewを追加
								}
						}
					}					
					

					var length_view = document.getElementsByClassName("event_box view");
					if(length_view.length != 0){
						document.getElementById("event_length").classList.add("event_none_view");
						let event_length = document.getElementById("event_length");
						event_length.textContent = '該当するイベントは' + length_view.length + '件あります';
					}else{
						document.getElementById("event_length").classList.remove("event_none_view");
						let event_length = document.getElementById("event_length");
						document.getElementById("event_shop_list").classList.add("display_none");
						event_length.textContent = '該当するイベントはありません';
					}

				}
				
				function buttonClick(){
					//店舗検索のセレクトボックスIDを取得
					var shop_list = document.getElementById('shop_list');
						
					//選ばれているvalueを取得
					var view_shop = shop_list.value;
						
					//日付検索のセレクトボックスIDを取得
					var date_list = document.getElementById('date_list');
						
					//選ばれているvalueを取得
					var view_date = date_list.value;
						
					//日付検索のセレクトボックスIDを取得
					var state_list = document.getElementById('state_list');
						
					//選ばれているvalueを取得
					var view_state = state_list.value;
					
					shop_list.options[0].selected = true;
					date_list.options[0].selected = true;
					state_list.options[0].selected = true;
					
					Change();				
				}
				
				function stateChange(){
					//店舗検索のセレクトボックスIDを取得
					var shop_list = document.getElementById('shop_list');
						
					//選ばれているvalueを取得
					var view_shop = shop_list.value;
					
					shop_list.options[0].selected = true;
					
					Change();
				}
			</script>
		</div>
	</div>
	
	<div class="cont">

		<picture>

		</picture>

大会の受付時間前のご来店で席を利用される場合は利用料が掛かります。
参加費５００円+１パックの購入をお願いします。
